about.title: Who am I
about.description: am a software engineer, CEO of hunter-tech and occasionally a designer. My passion for computer science dates back to my first year at university in 2012 when I discovered JavaScript and PHP.
about.text-1: Since then, I have not hesitated to discover, design and build ultra-modern and scalable platforms and applications through the multiple technologies that make up my profile.
about.text-2: Among which the main ones are:

experiences.description: Software engineer, using modern technologies to design and create AI-based testing applications.

Continuously learning new technologies and creating scalable applications for clients and myself.

contact.title: What's next?
contact.description: I am interested in freelance and remote opportunities - particularly ambitious or large-scale projects. However, if you have other requests, questions, or just want to say hello, I will do my best to respond!
